website_summaries.verdict: Not practical as a combination sit-stand desk, so we recommend sticking with it purely as a stand up workstation.
pros: Although at first glance it appears quite slender, it's actually very stable
The metal frame is powder-coated, a finish known for its durability
cons: Height is not easily adjustable — you have to undo four screws to move it

customer_reviews.title: The stupid thing doesn't allow quick height adjustment!
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible. First off the assembly sucks. I finally got it together by myself, but the instructions are a bit deceptive. And it doesn't explain where or how to install the shelves in the correct placement. But the biggest problem is that it's an ordeal to adjust the height. You can't just adjust in from minute to minute because there are 4 screws that are not easy to get to in order to make the thing raise and lower. I'm pretty mad about this and would maybe like to send it back but I have no idea how that would work.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Kreplachsky

customer_reviews.title: It's Alright
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to set up but the instructions were all in pictures, no words. to be able to adjust the height is ridiculous! You have to take everything off to reset the screws. Even then, I had to lay it on the floor just to adjust it equally.
customer_reviews.author: Stepgree

customer_reviews.title: Standing OR sitting, not easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: This is EITHER a standing OR sitting desk, not both. It can be up all the way, or down all the way. The adjustable part is for the bottom shelf if you want it down. The piece that could make it adjustable is actually welded to the bottom rolling casters and can’t be turned over. It IS sturdy with nice wood, and works well with a high chair. I’m rating it so low because of the false advertising. No reasonable person would want to disassemble and adjust it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie R. Walasek

customer_reviews.title: A really nice, solid desk for a relatively inexpensive price
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. Normally when I buy inexpensive furniture pieces such as this they are really junk. This piece is quite nice - the wood shelves feel nice and solid and the unit itself seems stable and solid. Everything assembled without difficulty, no misaligned screw holes, etc. I'm very pleased with this standing desk!
customer_reviews.author: coolshop

customer_reviews.title: There are better designs with better assembly
customer_reviews.text: I should have read more carefully but this desk has a fixed height unless you reassemble. Ideally I’d choose a desk with a lever to go from sitting to standing. While I wouldn’t give a bad review for not understanding this feature it makes it less competitive with alternative desks. I also typically enjoy installing furniture but it is incredibly difficult to figure out how to set up this desk for anything other than the max height which makes it too tall for me. Overall it seems like there are serval ways the design could be improved and installation is not intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Laura McComb

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Mobile
customer_reviews.text: This desk took a bit to assemble but it is strong and well built. The directions are also easy to follow. It is super handy to work at home with during covid since you can go from room to room. It holds laptop and other materials well. I stand or sit at it and can move the laptop to whichever level matches my position.
customer_reviews.author: Ljr

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Pretty Meh about this product. I think it does the minimum job of being a standup desk, but it's quite a pain to move/adjust it. It's not really that easily adjustable, and you need to move both sides at the appropriately to keep it leveled. I do love: that it can move around pretty easily on the floor. It has nice wheels, and they can lock in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This desk is exactly what I was looking for. It has a small footprint unlike other desks. It is 29" wide and doesn't take up a lot of space. The keyboard tray is at the perfect distance ratio to the top shelf. I didn't assemble it but my husband said it wasn't super easy but he did it. I love that I can move it around and it has everything I need. The best part is the small footprint since we have a small place. Functional and not encumbering to our space! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Benezet

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is a pain as is adjusting
customer_reviews.text: This took forever to get to me and assembly was inelegant. I'd like to be able to adjust the height easier, but since it's such a pain it's likely to stay at its present height forever.
customer_reviews.author: Van Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Very good desk.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sturdy desk that I sit my Mac 27 in on and holds great. All the pieces are nice and strong not like the crap desks you can by at wall mart. Unfortunately, I wasn't completely sure how to put this together with the directions because of the double sided foam tape that holds the two bottom shelves. So, those are wrong until I get new foam tape stuff (you only get one shot). The rest of the build was simple and came together very fast. But all in all, great desk keeps my computer out of the way and super comfortable to work on.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Watson

customer_reviews.title: A little wobbly, but overall ok
customer_reviews.text: The product is really nice once it's built. The instructions that come in the box are inadequate and you will need to be a pretty handy person in order to put it together. Once it's set up, it is a little wobbly. Even when I'm typing, my monitor moves around a bit because the desk itself is not incredibly sturdy. It is good enough for me to trust putting my monitor and computer on it, so it's not terrible. The best part of this is that it give you great height (I'm 5'11") to stand up at and look at a monitor with good posture.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Wells

customer_reviews.title: Looks a lot sturdier than it is
customer_reviews.text: You will go nuts trying to figure out the instructions, but if you persevere you can do it. And when you are finished, you will have a product that will look good as long as you don't put anything too heavy on the top. The bottom two shelves rest on metal cross-pieces and are fastened with (yikes) double-sided sticky tape, so be sure you have them where you want them when you are lowering the shelves onto the supports, because there is no turning back, and if you try moving the unit by lifting on the lower shelves, you could be in for a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Ladner

customer_reviews.title: Too Silly...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was looking for something inexpensive to put in my office so I could stand up. It took awhile to put this together, it arrived with a corner of the top shelf damaged but decided to try it anyway since I had already dismantled my office to use it and the damaged part would be out of sight. After I put my laptop underneath and my monitor on top I went to hook up the keyboard and mouse and realized the keyboard tray is only wide enough for the keyboard... well, anyone who uses a computer knows you can't live without a mouse... you do the math~!!!
customer_reviews.author: DKat

customer_reviews.title: Love this standing desk!
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal product for those who went from an active position in the workplace to working online during the pandemic. My hips feel better already because I stand while I work. It is a little challenging to put together because of the different shelves, but these shelves are practical and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Edmundson

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I teach online, and needed a desk to use for my camera and classroom materials. This desk was easy to assemble, and it has been very sturdy! It has been very useful. I use it every day, and I sometimes work on weekends. It still seems to be as sturdy as when I bought it about a year ago. So far, I'm loving this product.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for the money
customer_reviews.text: Loving the standing desk - great price and it looks really good (IMO) and was pretty easy to put together if you are somewhat mechanically inclined. One thing that I noticed is the keyboard tray will roll back when you are trying to use it - I put binder clips on the railing behind the tray and that took care of it. Once it's together it's together - I wouldn't want to have to do many adjustments so make sure you know how high you want everything. I did adjust the keyboard tray down a bit - only took about 5 minutes. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this desk. It's a perfect standing desk for my laptop in my small apartment, since it's a small desk as far as standing desks go. The adjustable hight works well for me, it's really only good for initial adjustment though not for daily or weekly height changes if you plan on using it for multiple people. Putting it together wasn't too difficult, there was one step where the screws didn't fit into the wholes so I had to use a screw driver to make the holes bigger, but after that everything went well.
customer_reviews.author: jja

customer_reviews.title: Cheap parts, but the whole is ok.
customer_reviews.text: The desk serves its purpose. It's definitely of the IKEA sort of mindset: cheap parts and cheap materials for the frugal consumer that doesn't mind a half hour of putting it together. The moment I put pressure on the wheels one of them snapped and bent the stand. I called in for a replacement and they replaced the wheel, but not the metal stand (so that in essence does nothing). It took a couple weeks to get the replacement, but the customer service rep was helpful. All in all, it's an ok piece of low-end furniture. I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Lang

customer_reviews.title: NEVER BUY WORST MISTAKE EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely terrible desk that no one should buy. The top portion basically just SITS ON THE TOP WITH NO SCEWS HOLDING IT IN PLACE. It wobbles and is completely unsafe. Do not buy. It is worthless
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, attractive at a very reasonable price. No missing pieces. Fairly easy to put together by yourself - I'm female and not that mechanically inclined. Also reasonably easy to adjust for something that is not electric or hand crank. If you need to alternate between sitting and standing throughout the day, I'd suggest spending more money for something that is easily changed, but if you intend to use it mainly for standing or sitting, it's a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Deb L

customer_reviews.title: a nice looking, very well made product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with no damage, assembly was not difficult... although height adjustment is rather awkward and almost a two person job. It's more designed to be set and left. The lower shelves came with velcro attachments, not thrilled with that. But overall, a nice looking, very well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: so if you have some super-sized keyboard & mouse it may not be a good fit for you
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for my needs: space-efficient and reasonably priced compared to a lot of the other options out there. With the narrow base I was worried about a lot of shaking of the unit, but I haven't noticed any problems. I use a dual monitor arm with two 22" panels and it seems very stable. The keyboard tray is just wide enough for a standard-sized keyboard and a mouse pad of about 5-6 inches wide, so if you have some super-sized keyboard & mouse it may not be a good fit for you.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P.

customer_reviews.title: It's fine if you don't care about being comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's fine if you don't care about being comfortable. If you're going to study, play games, or be productive--this is a show stopper. If you're going to pay bills once a month, or print something occasionally, then fine. I would recommend an adjustable sit-stand desk instead.
customer_reviews.author: ao

customer_reviews.title: Delivers what it promises at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Height adjustment and leveling is an issue due to the bolt-tightening tension system, but once you get the height set well, it does exactly what it promises. Small footprint + on casters is great for smaller apartments or when you want to be able to get it out of sight when company comes over. My casters *do* snap into place, unlike other reviewers' experience (maybe they didn't apply enough force?).
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk - but...
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a stand-up desk at work, so I bought this one, and after a few weeks, I do not really have any complaints. The reason that I have given the desk 4 stars instead of 5, however, is because it is a bit wobbly, even with the back wheels locked out, all wheels turned outward for maximum base-width, and all screws well tightened. I am pleased with the purchase, but for the price would have expected it to feel more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jack R. Lainhart

customer_reviews.title: Stand Up Desk is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this stand up desk! I got it to burn more calories while I am at work on the computer and I am starting to feel my pants fit a little better already. But, the surprise benefit is that I don't get tired when I am working at the desk for a long time, like I used to while sitting. I feel much more energized and positive while I do my work...really nice side benefit that I noticed right away! Great investment. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Love my Desk
customer_reviews.text: My desk arrived quickly, and my husband was able to put it together fairly easily. It helped to read about issues that others had. Some of the assembly might have been tough for me (like popping the casters into place), but wasn't for him. And I do love my desk! It seemed to be the best deal by far of the many that I investigated via the Internet. It actually looks nice next to my (real) oak desk and file cabinets. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MusicDoc

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift and it arrived quickly. After my brother assembled the table, he noticed that the table leg was broken. I contacted them immediately and they gave me two option to either receive a partial refund or send the item back for replacement. Since my brother already assembled it, we decided to take the partial refund. Quick and nice customer service. The table still worked fine without the front part of the table leg!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: customer service not much help, but desk is great
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, solid desk for the price. My only complaint is that one of the holes in one of the metal pieces had not been drilled properly and so I could not assemble it. When I called customer service they were nice but said they would send a new piece, but never did. After 4 weeks, I took the piece to a friend who had the right tools and got it fixed myself. Then putting it together was not easy - the directions are not easy to follow. But now that it's together, I really like it and I find standing while working SO much better for me physically.
customer_reviews.author: rlw2867

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this desk
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this desk!!!! It is sturdy, it adjusts easily, it went together well. I called Staples and they have a business that puts furniture together and the technician was in and out of my office in less than an hour. This desk is mobile so great for home too! You can have your computer or laptop and a file open on top of it, complete and full work station, I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Melby

customer_reviews.title: Value product
customer_reviews.text: Good Sturdy and Spacious standing computer desk, value for the money when compared to other such products. Can also be used as a small desk. These are the things to note. Height adjustment cannot be done at will/ Need 2 people to assemble / adjust height. An option to replace roller blade with fixed leg would make this product even more great as there is slight wobble because of roller.
customer_reviews.author: Pirai soodan

customer_reviews.title: Literally put together with tape.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom two shelves. Are held in place. With adhesive tape. Otherwise not a bad desk, you know, until the shelves come off. I can't imagine it would have cost that much to drill some holes and include some screws. I would've paid $5-$10 more for that.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Townsend

customer_reviews.title: A good item
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this desk for an office worker that enters data all day long. It's not the sturdiest desk but it has held up well under normal use. Although some my laugh or balk at the idea the person that uses this desk has great posture and looks trim because he's not sitting and staring at a screen drinking coffee and eating donuts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty desk, very flawed.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty desk, keyboard slider broke without weight (came home and the keyboard shelf was lopsided and the bearings were all over the floor), also the desk hight isn't adjustable on the fly.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Impellezzeri

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for work and love it. I have sat at my desk for 8 hours a day for the past 10 years. It was time for a change. the workstation is excellant quality and I am now up on my feet. This just has to be better for my health than just sitting all day. I do have to wear better quality shoes with better support but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori McDonnough

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent desk for the price! Easy to assemble, and relatively easy to tweak height after assembly (just have to pop off the sides). I wish there were 1-2 lower holes for the pullout keyboard; it was a tiny bit too high even at the lowest setting so I've had to lower the overall desk and put my laptop on a book to elevate the screen. (If you're using a monitor instead of a laptop, you should be fine.)
customer_reviews.author: NWW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stand-Up Desk!
customer_reviews.text: I use this desk almost every day and I love it! It came together pretty easy though it has a lot of parts and takes a little patience. The veneer is high quality, wears well, looks great and is very comfortable. I move it from my office to living room and it's working out better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: An unpretentious table that gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I have no understanding why some of these standup desks go for 1000's of dollars, when this one works just fine. I have been using it for months and find that it delivers on its promise. If you have worked with your hands before, and have a "physical feel" for building things, then assembling it is not hard.
customer_reviews.author: Roshini Joseph

customer_reviews.title: parts cant fit
customer_reviews.text: Part Q cant screw into part U. Part U cant slide all the way into place. It is about 1/16 short. All four part Q are misaligned. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: karenenid

customer_reviews.title: I like this desk, but I don't see how to adjust the height.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking sturdy desk that I feel comfortable placing a computer on. BUT, the height does not seem adjustable to me. The instructions I would also say are a little weak, they suggest you put the screws for the wheels in first, even though this means you won't be able to stand the desk while you construct it. Pretty happy though outside these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ariyeh Maller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, good price, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I do wish that there was a bit more room on the shelves, as the tower on my computer (which is standard size) does not fit on either one. As a result, the computer sits on the ground beside the desk, which isn't ideal. However, you can't beat the price, it is attractive and fits my needs well, and overall has been a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LadyG

customer_reviews.title: great at the office instead of sitting at computer
customer_reviews.text: great at the office instead of sitting at computer, bought two more, a lot sturdier than most computer desks, set yourself some time and definitely a 2 person job when tightening/finally assembly or it won't be straight, the sliding shelf will stick
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I love this and the reviewers that stated it is difficult to put together are wrong! I did it by myself!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Safeco stand-up desk is sturdy and looks good in my office.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and meets my requirements to support my computer system. No negatives with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Geemoe Knee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, sturdy, functions well, went together quite easily. Purchased a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Marty

customer_reviews.title: Good, With Some Bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent standing desk for the price. There are 2 things to know about the desk. One is that the keyboard tray is NOT wide enough for a keyboard and mouse. I'm not sure how they could have overlooked this. The second is that you will need a rubber mallet to pound the caster feet in to the stand. It isn't optimum, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stand up stand assemble is a pain
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent stand, well made and strong. The height adjustment is a bit of a pain, not easily changed once set. The instructions were a pain, have to use your common sense and even then had to do a few things twice. The instructions are vague and outright wrong in some places. It looks good once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fiedler

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I've been looking for for several years now. I bought it because I realized I was sitting way too much. I had limited space to put it in, and from the reviews I read it seemed to be of very good quality. And it was a price I could afford. My daughter and I put it together in a couple of hours, and the manual was easy to read for the novices we are. It is perfect, and I'm glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Came with broken parts
customer_reviews.text: Company did replace after an email and phone call however. Made and packed overseas and if it would have been packed better I'd give it four stars. Does what it says it will do. Nothing fancy but provides much needed break from sitting at desk for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Herb from Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect choice to get me up and away from my desk and still give me the workspace that I needed. Arrived promptly, and was very easy to assemble. I purchased an anti-fatigue mat to go along with this, as well as some very comfortable shoes - I can work here all day now and my back is very grateful!
customer_reviews.author: ljrwr

customer_reviews.title: I can't go to Starbucks anymore
customer_reviews.text: This desk is great. The instructions are definitely hard to understand, but if you go slowly they will make sense. The desk is giant and quite stable. I'm using it to support a 27" Thunderbolt Display and a 15" Laptop on a WCI Stand. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Easily to build and adjustable as described
customer_reviews.text: ...needs two peoples to assemble: I had daughter and grandson to assist. Easily to build and adjustable as described. Instructions are good and detailed: remember to follow to avoid later problems.
customer_reviews.author: Giorgio Via

customer_reviews.title: Diamond in the ruff - very happy.
customer_reviews.text: The standing desk is everything I was looking for. Sturdy, level, easy to put together and move. Every quality of this has met or exceeded expectations. The drawer locks shut, the casters work well, and it is easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Love this deSk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Working from home I like to be able to roam around the house! With this desk... I can!!! Easy to put together!!! Looks great also!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M Taft

customer_reviews.title: A pain to set up, but a pleasure to use
customer_reviews.text: I love my standup desk and use it about half the workday when I'm working in my office. The assembly instructions are horrible and that makes it a tad difficult to assemble. But once it's assembled, it's a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Kirkendall

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. I use it for my oversized laptop and still have room on the top surface for mouse and small notebook. I don't need the keyboard tray so I just use it to store papers. Great to have the shelves to store things on too. Was not difficult to assemble and we are not handy people, took less than an hour. I only gave it four stars because it is a little pricy, it is pressed wood but good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After one year, I still love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this standing desk for about a year. It is perfect. Love it. I am tall (6'-2") and it adjusts perfectly. Quality construction, no signs of wear. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: IconTom

customer_reviews.title: Great stand up desk.
customer_reviews.text: Very good desk, I am 6' 4" and at the top setting it works very well for me. I combined it with a high rise chair for comfort. Was easy to assemble and move about.
customer_reviews.author: James Peebler

customer_reviews.title: A Healthier Way to Work
customer_reviews.text: "Sitting is the new smoking." I sit all day for my work. But I write lots of reports. I tried this and it works perfectly. I use it every day and it is healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Gordon, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: This desk was a really complicated to put together. ...
customer_reviews.text: This desk was a really complicated to put together. If the instructions were much easier to understand, I would've given this five stars. The desk is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: emilieemanuel

customer_reviews.title: Images are not directions
customer_reviews.text: Without written directions to go along with the diagrams I got lost after step four. One of the wing nuts to tighten the sliding portion broke completely off. The whole thing is now in recycle.
customer_reviews.author: scott l campbell

customer_reviews.title: cheap product
customer_reviews.text: The sliding track for the keyboard shelf broke when I was trying to install, the actual track, thus can't use that shelf at all now. The 2 lower shelves just are on with double sided tape, not real secure. The 4 roller feet, fall off easily. This product is not worth the price, very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Stand -up desk
customer_reviews.text: I had read that sitting was as unhealthy as smoking, so I tried some make- shift stand -up desk arrangements .I liked the experience so I looked for products like the Safco. Since the order my entire experience has been positive. It was delivered quickly,It was not extremely difficult to assemble,and it fits me even though I am taller than average. It is solid , well finished and I have more energy since using it .( I use it up to 4 hours a day) .I believe that humans are better off standing and ,of course moving more.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was not difficult at all if you have some basic aptitude with tools. I did it without a second pair of hands. Fully adjustable - I'm 6' and it's perfect for my height. I took others' advice and left the wheels off - sits flat on my floor.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk. It was fairly easy to put together. It is a very nice cherry color that goes well with my office. I like that it has wheels so that I can move it around when necessary. The wheels are not of such quality that I would move it around regularly. It is just big enough for a computer work station, and it keeps me from letting too much paperwork get piled up. The height is easily adjustable, assuming you remove the computer screen and keyboard from the top of the table.
customer_reviews.author: CJWR755

customer_reviews.title: Better way to work
customer_reviews.text: I sit at a desk all day and my posture was suffering from this. I've had this desk about a year and it has made a big difference in my posture and how my back and shoulders feel at the end of the day. I thought I would get tired standing all day, but that hasn't happened. I actually have more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Ricarole

customer_reviews.title: make sure you have enough clearance for the amount of space you like to have for your mouse in addition to your ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a little narrow, make sure you have enough clearance for the amount of space you like to have for your mouse in addition to your keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Tona L Willand

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and inexpensive but color is off
customer_reviews.text: I love the desk. It arrived well packed and free of damage. It was very easy to assemble and looks nice... well, i was hoping the colors to match the picture but it still looks great. My only complaint is that the Chery PVC looks much lighter than in the picture and side legs and covers are black and not gray. Anyways, the color variation didn't bother me so much to lower my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Rio

customer_reviews.title: Need a standing workstation?
customer_reviews.text: If you are in need of a standing work station at a reasonable price, this product will do the trick. One employee in our office stands for all his work. This product was easy to assemble and fits the need well. It fits nicely next to the employee's regular workstation and holds both a laptop and external monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: It's compact, a perfect height, and nice looking. I wish the 2 shelves were adjustable, but I can work with it. A pretty good desk for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Z. Culver

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble but not to adjust.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to assemble but once assembled, adjusting the height is not very convenient. Side panels must be removed each time and if you are adjusting this alone you must try to hold the heavy top in place while tightening the screws. If you plan on setting the height once & leaving it you will be happy with this workstation but don't get it if you are wanting one you can easily switch positions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect standing station
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever!!! Fits a compact space. Accommodates me, after having two back surgeries, to get computer work done at home too.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice quality. It looks professional and is solid. Was easy to assemble. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: LoLoLoLoLola

customer_reviews.title: Good standing workstation
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, setup is easy enough, and it accommodates my needs at 6' tall just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 'do it yourself' tread-desk set up
customer_reviews.text: The desk is just as pictured. I chose the Cherry color and it goes perfectly with my other office furniture -- also Cherry laminate. I used this to create my own tread-desk and it works great. I like the vertical adjustments -- I am 5'3" and many of the adjustable desks would not go low enough for me. This one does. This took about 15 minutes to put together -- also easy.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Cardwell

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought one that fit on desk top... this is just too narrow and clumsy and not at all conducive to work.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Daniel L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrific stand up desk BUT you need someone who knows what they are doing to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Jubilee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This desk is fantastic and goes together easily. My wife loves it and it looks very nice!
customer_reviews.author: RobO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk. Everyone should work while standing at least ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent desk. Everyone should work while standing at least part of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Athans

customer_reviews.title: Safco stand up workstation
customer_reviews.text: Well built and sturdy cart. Directions are not all that clear as they are in picture form only. Wheels are pretty much for hard surfaces only- they do not roll well across carpet. Bottom shelf is adjustable although it is not stated anywhere. Plus top shelves are adjustable once you remove the plastic covers to access the wing pins. Glad I got it. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: gary r

customer_reviews.title: Best for compact workstations
customer_reviews.text: Product requires assembly but when set up properly and adjusted to your requirements it makes an immediate difference in ergonomic reduction in strain. Best for compact workstations. I recommend using an anti fatigue floor mat.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Parmer

customer_reviews.title: This desk is "Just Right"
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'5" tall and needed something that was proportionate. This is it. Took about 45 minutes to assemble, rolled it into place in my office and have used it regularly every day since. Recommend it to tall guys.
customer_reviews.author: RogerL

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand-up desk
customer_reviews.text: This stand-up desk is sturdy, was relatively easy to assemble, and adjusts perfectly to my height of 5' 4 3/4". I only wish there was an inch or two extra width for the keyboard tray; although the tray fits my standard-sized keyboard and mouse, the mouse could use a little more room for maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: David Zammiello

customer_reviews.title: Mobile workstation
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific piece of furniture if you want to make your PC mobile. Not too hard to assemble and the platform is easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Cox  Clemson SC

customer_reviews.title: Great work station
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson. He is thrilled with it. Said went together fast and everything fits well. Just what he needed.
customer_reviews.author: shirl G.

customer_reviews.title: Stand up desk choice is a healthy one.
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I could want in a stand up desk. It was simple to put together, I have a lot of equipment on it and have used it five months without any complaints. The choice to get a stand up desk was simple and this was the most affordable one that could go into a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Bad install instructions, short keyboard tray, solid build, good value.
customer_reviews.text: I like how adjustable it is, but it's a pain in the ass to assemble. The instructions are very lacking, only diagrams, no text to clarify. This would be very useful on many sections of the install. Secondly, there is not enough room for a mouse on the keyboard tray. Because of this, I'm getting a tenkeyless keyboard, which I kinda wanted anyways... but damnit, I wanted the option!
customer_reviews.author: Chad R

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy desk
customer_reviews.text: Perfect standup desk: it took under 30 min to put it together, alone! Not much else to say that hasn't been said before:)
customer_reviews.author: Tom Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor Construction
customer_reviews.text: Half the parts did not fit right in initial construction, then the key board tray sliders broke as it was pulled out for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Oizon

customer_reviews.title: Great standup desk
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great standup desk at home and it makes my working at home really pleasant. Another great thing about it is, I can roll the desk to anywhere I feel like.
customer_reviews.author: YB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desk, great for online teaching!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome desk, just be aware the shelves are mounted with double sided tape.
customer_reviews.author: Amara

customer_reviews.title: Love this stand up desk!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this desk. I am 6'1 and this desk was easy to adjust and is comfortable for my height. If you are looking for a stand-up desk, I would give this one a try. Putting this desk together was a bit of a challenge, though, as the instructions did not contain very many written words.
customer_reviews.author: Becki Farley

customer_reviews.title: Stand up to your computer!
customer_reviews.text: Our staff geologists work at a table where they can stand and not break their backs over their maps and study. They wanted a stand up desk for their computer to eliminate up and down movement throughout their day. This particular desk does an outstanding job and is very well made. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Nomigtman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and good looking desk. It's works so great in our busy hospital!!
customer_reviews.author: lindsay everett

customer_reviews.title: Great desk, misleading photo.
customer_reviews.text: This desk is great. Assembly was easy, but not quick. Desk is the perfect size and the three shelves underneath the table top provide a great amount of storage. I'm giving this item 3 stars because the colors do NOT match the picture. I ordered the "Cherry" option, and the picture shows a cherry wood desk with gray/steel sides. What arrived was black siding. If you look at the photo of the "Medium Oak" option, that is the siding you are getting. This is a bit disappointing because I really wasn't planning on doing black for my office. But it is just too heavy and too much of a hassle to send it back, so I'm making it work.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Niemann

customer_reviews.title: Very good desk
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a bit more table space, but it's a great desk. I love standing instead of sitting, and as a bonus, I've lost 10 pounds since using it.
customer_reviews.author: April k. McGlothin

customer_reviews.title: Good for Price
customer_reviews.text: Put it together in 30 minutes. Inconvenient to adjust height after set, but a good quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Stand Up Workstation
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a counter height, stand up workstation, and my husband found this Safco product on Amazon. The price was much lower than any other I saw comparable, so we bought it. It was very easy to put together. I did it 99% on my own. It is very nice looking and seems to be well made. I am very pleased with my Safco purchase. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SandyO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The desk works wonderful. Helpful when trying to avoid sitting all day. Spending at least half the time at work at this standup work station. Feel great at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Haltaman

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy or adjustable
customer_reviews.text: The unit is not very sturdy, and tends to tip. Worse, the height adjustment is unreachable once assembled - the top shelf occludes the adjustment wing nuts - terrible design.
customer_reviews.author: KJK

product_meta.title: Safco Products Muv 35-49"H Stand-Up Desk Adjustable Height Computer Workstation with Keyboard Shelf, Cherry
product_meta.description: Color:CherryGet a Muv on and choose to stand with the Muv workstation that adjusts in height from 35" to 49" for stand-up computer work. Overall the workstation is 29 1/2"W x 22"D with a durable 3/4" melamine laminate top worksurface 29 1/2"W x 19 3/4"D. Fully equipped with an adjustable 22 3/4"W x 13 1/2"D keyboard shelf. The keyboard shelf extends 9 3/4" and retracts under the work surface when not in use. Additional 2 lower shelves. Decorative molded side panels hide computer cables and cords for a clean appearance. Steel frame construction with durable powder coat finish. Mobile on four dual wheel carpet casters, 2 locking.
feature_bullets: Stand-up adjustable height 35" to 49"H computer workstation desk
Durable 3/4" melamine laminate work surface 29 1/2"W x 19 3/4"D, adjustable keyboard 22 3/4"W x 13 1/2"D and 2 lower shelves
Decorative molded side panels hide computer cables and cords
Steel frame construction with durable powder coat finish
Mobile on four dual wheel carpet casters, two locking

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars224 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
